Caution: Cooking with liquor and other spirits can be intoxicating!

Adding liquors and spirits into simple dishes is the ultimate way to add potent flavor and subtle flair. Most people already have a well-stocked liquor cabinet, and anything from anise to whiskey can be splashed into a marinade, incorporated into a soup, or baked into a rich dessert. The GourmetÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Guide to Cooking with Liquors and Spirits will take your cooking from everyday to elegant.
